00065 int RainbruRPG::Network::NetPacketBase::convert(int i){
00066 #if __BYTE_ORDER == __LITTLE_ENDIAN
00067   return i;
00068 #elif __BYTE_ORDER == __BIG_ENDIAN
00069   return GINT_TO_LE(i);
00070 #else
00071 # error "Please fix <bits/endian.h>"
00072 #endif
00073 }

00098 void RainbruRPG::Network::NetPacketBase::
00099 setData(enet_uint8* d, size_t len){
00100   // Copy 2 bytes to get the packet identifier
00101   memcpy(&data->data, d, 2);
00102   id=static_cast<RainbruRPG::Network::tNetPacketIdentifier>
00103     GUINT16_FROM_LE(data->packetIdentifier);
00104 }

00113 const char* RainbruRPG::Network::NetPacketBase::
00114 typeToString(tNetPacketIdentifier t){
00115 
00116   const char* ret;
00117 
00118   switch(t){
00119   case NPI_GEN_IDENT :
00120     ret="Identification";
00121     break;
00122 
00123   case NPI_SVR_CONRESP:
00124     ret="Server connection response";
00125     break;
00126 
00127   case NPI_INVALID:
00128     ret="Unset";
00129     break;
00130 
00131   default:
00132     ret="Error";
00133     break;
00134   }
00135 
00136   return ret;
00137 }
